messages.content: I have been in local politics for years and have strived to be honest and transparent. If elected as your MP I will continue to act in this manner.
Like so many of you, I am proud to be both Scottish and British and consider myself lucky to live in Argyll & Bute. This is where my family, my wife Janet, Sammy-Jo and I call home.
Please help elect a dedicated local candidate as your MP who has a positive track record of public service.
Finally, however you vote, thank you for taking the time to read this letter.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been in local politics for years and have strived to be honest and transparent. If elected as your MP I will continue to act in this manner and, as my current job is outside politics I will also bring some real life experience to the House of Commons.

contactInformation.address: both of 61 Chalmers Street, Ardrishaig PA30 8DX and Hay Ltd., 58 Robert Street, Glasgow G40 2AA

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by S. MacPherson, on behalf of G. Mulvaney.
